verses.verse: The word<WH1697> which came unto Jeremiah<WH3414> from the LORD<WH3068>, when king<WH4428> Zedekiah<WH6667> sent<WH7971> unto him Pashur<WH6583> the son<WH1121> of Melchiah<WH4441>, and Zephaniah<WH6846> the son<WH1121> of Maaseiah<WH4641> the priest<WH3548>, saying<WH559>,

Enquire<WH1875>, I pray thee, of the LORD<WH3068> for us<WH1157>; for Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> maketh war<WH3898> against us; if so be that the LORD<WH3068> will deal<WH6213> with us according to all his wondrous works<WH6381>, that he may go up<WH5927> from us.
Then said<WH559> Jeremiah<WH3414> unto them, Thus shall ye say<WH559> to Zedekiah<WH6667>:

Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>; Behold, I will turn back<WH5437> the weapons<WH3627> of war<WH4421> that are in your hands<WH3027>, wherewith ye fight<WH3898> against the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, and against the Chaldeans<WH3778>, which besiege<WH6696> you without<WH2351> the walls<WH2346>, and I will assemble<WH622> them into the midst<WH8432> of this city<WH5892>.

And I myself will fight<WH3898> against you with an outstretched<WH5186> hand<WH3027> and with a strong<WH2389> arm<WH2220>, even in anger<WH639>, and in fury<WH2534>, and in great<WH1419> wrath<WH7110>.
And I will smite<WH5221> the inhabitants<WH3427> of this city<WH5892>, both man<WH120> and beast<WH929>: they shall die<WH4191> of a great<WH1419> pestilence<WH1698>.

And afterward<WH310>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>, I will deliver<WH5414> Zedekiah<WH6667> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>, and his servants<WH5650>, and the people<WH5971>, and such as are left<WH7604> in this city<WH5892> from the pestilence<WH1698>, from the sword<WH2719>, and from the famine<WH7458>, into the hand<WH3027> of Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, and into the hand<WH3027> of their enemies<WH341>, and into the hand<WH3027> of those that seek<WH1245> their life<WH5315>: and he shall smite<WH5221> them with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>; he shall not spare<WH2347> them, neither have pity<WH2550>, nor have mercy<WH7355>.
And unto this people<WH5971> thou shalt say<WH559>, Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068>; Behold, I set<WH5414> before<WH6440> you the way<WH1870> of life<WH2416>, and the way<WH1870> of death<WH4194>.

He that abideth<WH3427> in this city<WH5892> shall die<WH4191> by the sword<WH2719>, and by the famine<WH7458>, and by the pestilence<WH1698>: but he that goeth out<WH3318>, and falleth<WH5307> to the Chaldeans<WH3778> that besiege<WH6696> you, he shall live<WH2421> <WH2421>, and his life<WH5315> shall be unto him for a prey<WH7998>.

For I have set<WH7760> my face<WH6440> against this city<WH5892> for evil<WH7451>, and not for good<WH2896>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>: it shall be given<WH5414> into the hand<WH3027> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, and he shall burn<WH8313> it with fire<WH784>.
And touching the house<WH1004> of the king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>, say, Hear<WH8085> ye the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068>;

O house<WH1004> of David<WH1732>, thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068>; Execute<WH1777> judgment<WH4941> in the morning<WH1242>, and deliver<WH5337> him that is spoiled<WH1497> out of the hand<WH3027> of the oppressor<WH6231>, lest my fury<WH2534> go out<WH3318> like fire<WH784>, and burn<WH1197> that none can quench<WH3518> it, because<WH6440> of the evil<WH7455> of your doings<WH4611>. Execute: Heb. Judge

Behold, I am against thee, O inhabitant<WH3427> of the valley<WH6010>, and rock<WH6697> of the plain<WH4334>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>; which say<WH559>, Who shall come down<WH5181> against us? or who shall enter<WH935> into our habitations<WH4585>? inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress

But I will punish<WH6485> you according to the fruit<WH6529> of your doings<WH4611>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>: and I will kindle<WH3341> a fire<WH784> in the forest<WH3293> thereof, and it shall devour<WH398> all things round about<WH5439> it. punish: Heb. visit upon
